workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.4919102994403783 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.33517008449477625 --weight-decay 0.0007284389400605775 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0005996292309438012 --lr-period-updates 146154.83476980036 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.1088187381768542 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
